buy_conditions.raw_condition: 2. price crosses above supply/demand zone (demand zone)
3. close above ALMA with multiplier 8 on a 15-minute timeframe
5. ema(144) > close on multiple timeframes (e.g., 1, 3, 5 min)
6. ATR-based volatility filter within acceptable range

sell_conditions.raw_condition: 2. price crosses below supply/demand zone (supply zone)
3. close below ALMA with multiplier 8 on a 15-minute timeframe
5. ema(144) < close on multiple timeframes (e.g., 1, 3, 5 min)
6. ATR-based volatility filter within acceptable range
